alert.note: Alert for Animas River Basin; Southwest San Juan Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 1:42PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central La Plata County through 215 PM MDT... At 142 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Durango, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Durango and Trimble. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 550 in Colorado between mile markers 21 and 32. U.S. Highway 160 in Colorado between mile markers 78 and 85, and between mile markers 89 and 99. Colorado 172 near mile marker 24. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Animas River Basin; Southwest San Juan Mountains
